## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run pre-commit hooks locally and all checks pass

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Test coverage has been maintained or improved (target: >80%)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added docstrings to new functions/classes following project standards
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added usage examples if introducing new functionality

### Dependencies & Security
- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities in new dependencies
- [ ] I have updated requirements files if dependencies changed
- [ ] No secrets or sensitive information are included in this PR
- [ ] Bandit security checks pass
